page.title: 15MY DAY BY KEVIN DATE AGED 10
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and put on a pair of black trousers,blue and white check shirt,navy blue jumper,blue socks and a pair of grey trainers.I have a wash and eat my breakfast of rice-crispies.I get to school at 8:20. I help Mum unlock the school,'put the chairs down in our class,and put the computer out for our class and load a programn.We have the radio service and than science than we have break.After break we have P.E and than our tables test and than read and than I go home for dinner.I have a chicken sandwich and than I go back to school at 1.10.We read to mrs Stark and we do our project and than we have our break and than after break in the Summer we go swimming.We go home at 3.15.I help Mum clean the school.I have my tea at 5.00.Than I watch t.v than I have a bath and have a bar of chocolate.
